channel.title: Rnadombarrows

item.title: Rnadombarrows
item.dc:creator: @Delta2 Delta_
item.description:
@Delta2 wrote:

Go into item2.java and add this

    public static int Test[] = {1};
        public static int randomTest()
        {
            return Test[(int)(Math.random()*Test.length)];
        }

Replace the 1 with item ids, if need more items seperate with commas.
Then you would use
addItem(Item2.randomTest(), 1);

Read full topic

item.title: Rnadombarrows
item.dc:creator: @Limit101 Limit101
item.description:
@Limit101 wrote:

Alright so theres a thing like randombarrows which gives you random stuff if you use something on a chest.

But how would you make something else like your own customrandom thing?

Also how would i make that i can use 2 diff items on a object to get the same outcome.

else if(useItemID == 85 && atObjectID == 378)//godwars { deleteItem(85, getItemSlot(85), 1); addItem(Item2.randomBarrows(), 1); sendMessage("Yay!");

Thats a example of what i have so please tell me how i would do the double item thing and making somthing else like randomcustom thing

Read full topic
